org.jetel.component.tree.writer.xml

Class XmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.tree.writer.TreeWriterBase
      • org.jetel.component.tree.writer.xml.XmlWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeWriter, CDataWriter, CommentWriter, NamespaceWriter, TreeWriter

    public class XmlWriter
extends TreeWriterBase
implements NamespaceWriter, AttributeWriter, CommentWriter, CDataWriter
    Simple implementation of streamed xml writer. Does not check validity of output xml.
